biography: Olivia designs conversations for a world without screens. As a Voice User Interface (VUI) Designer, she is an expert in crafting interactions that are natural, intuitive, and effective using only voice. She is a writer, a psychologist, and a user experience designer all rolled into one. She has a great ear for dialogue and a deep understanding of how people communicate, ensuring that talking to Katje's AI feels like talking to a person.
